div.a: Did you know that MindTouch has an out of the box Collaborative Knowledge Base solution?

div.p: Create your own templates or use the default templates below. You can add templates by clicking while editing.

div.a: Create a new page with a left highlight layout
Create a new page with a documentation and files layout
Create a new frequently asked questions layout

div.p: Keep your knowledge base organized with the MindTouch Desktop Connector. Manage, organize and modify your knowledge base from the comfort of a desktop application.
MindTouch provides a number of tools to make organizing and searching your content quick and effective.

ol.li: Tags: Tag your MindTouch pages to show relevant keywords and related pages.
Attachments: Attachments are indexed and searched for contextual relevance.
Comments: Add community generated content to your site to increase a pages relevancy.

div.p: User management with MindTouch is easy, extensive and versatile. Create new users, roles and groups in the control panel.
MindTouch allows you to limit content to particular users, roles and group. You can apply limitations to individual pages or entire hierarchies.

ol.li: Go to the page you wish to protect

a.title: http://campaign.mindtouch.com/OOBE/Contact
a.span: Did you know MindTouch 2009 has database connectors?
Did you know MindTouch 2009 has desktop tools?
Did you know MindTouch 2009 has powerful mashup capabilities?
Did you know MindTouch 2009 has premium support and training?
Did you know MindTouch 2009 has multi-tenant capabilities?
Did you know MindTouch 2009 has rich dashboards?

div.p: A customer extranet portal is a secure website that enables businesses to share documents, communicate and share content with customers in a central repository. The customer extranet portal provides access to collaborative tools with just an Internet connection.

The partner extranet portal is a private website that enables businesses to share content with partners in a secure environment. The partner extranet portal provides data connections with CRM as well as collaborative tools with just an Internet connection.
Creating new content makes your documentation richer and more valuable. Use the New page link to add a page or use the Edit page link to make changes to an existing page.
File management is simple, manageable and files are versioned with each modification.
Monitoring your extranet with MindTouch has never been easier. With page notifications you can receive edit overview emails when any or all pages are modified. Look for the icon on each page.
User management with MindTouch is easy, extensive and versatile. Create new users, roles and groups in the control panel.
Need to keep something to yourself? Privacy with MindTouch is easy and secure.

ol.li: Go to the page you wish to protect

div.a: Did you know that MindTouch has out of the box Collaborative Intranets?

div.p: MindTouch Intranets tightly integrate projects, content management, teams and search into a single out of the box intranet solution.
Leverage user contributions to build your intranet and establish community champions.
Authentication with MindTouch is flexible and powerful. MindTouch enables you to leverage your existing authentication providers such as LDAP/AD for a seamless single-sign-on experience.
Setting up your intranet is a snap. Set up team and department pages, dashboards and projects with just a few clicks.
Use MindTouch permissions to grant users access to specific hierarchies.
User management with MindTouch is easy, extensive and versatile. Create new users, roles and groups in the control panel.
Need to keep something to yourself? Privacy with MindTouch is easy and secure.
